content.text: Match ends, Brighton and Hove Albion 0, Leicester City 2.
Second Half ends, Brighton and Hove Albion 0, Leicester City 2.
Goal!  Brighton and Hove Albion 0, Leicester City 2. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Demarai Gray following a fast break.
Corner,  Brighton and Hove Albion. Conceded by Christian Fuchs.
Attempt missed. Glenn Murray (Brighton and Hove Albion) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Pascal Groß with a cross.
Corner,  Brighton and Hove Albion. Conceded by Vicente Iborra.
Corner,  Brighton and Hove Albion. Conceded by Ben Chilwell.
Corner,  Brighton and Hove Albion. Conceded by Kasper Schmeichel.
Attempt saved. Solly March (Brighton and Hove Albion) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Second yellow card to Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City) for a bad foul.
Foul by Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City).
Shane Duffy (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Leicester City. Christian Fuchs replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Sam Baldock replaces Beram Kayal.

Goal!  Brighton and Hove Albion 0, Leicester City 1. Vicente Iborra (Leicester City) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ben Chilwell with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Beram Kayal (Brighton and Hove Albion).

Substitution, Leicester City. Demarai Gray replaces Marc Albrighton.

Penalty saved! Glenn Murray (Brighton and Hove Albion) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty Brighton and Hove Albion. José Izquierdo draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Harry Maguire (Leicester City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Solly March replaces Jürgen Locadia.
Attempt missed. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Ben Chilwell with a cross.
